include.description: Optional list of glob patterns to select component exhibit files. This is relative to where the config file is. If defined, this must contain at least one entry.

watch.description: Optional list of glob patterns to select files/dirs to watch for changes in order to live-reload the exhibitor site. This is relative to where the config file is. If defined, this must contain at least one entry.

site.description: Optional configuration of the exhibitor site.

title.description: Optional title for the browser page of the site.

host.description: The host the site will be binded to.

port.description: The port the site will be binded to.

rootStyle.description: Optional path to a CSS or SCSS stylesheet to include as a root style. This is useful for defining styles shared by all components, i.e. icon/style libraries like font-awesome, muicons, bootstrap, or your own.
